>
[Kobold Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=5614) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=759" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 22 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You attentively learned key kobold survival strategies from your elders. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) and [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

 You also gain the [Additional Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=5114) general feat for [Kobold Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41).
name: Kobold Lore
